In the background, there are white walls and a window with partially closed blinds that allow some natural light into the room. title: An atomic absorption spectrophotometer is used to detect metals (such as arsenic) in pesticide samples by the Environmental Protection Agency at their Mississippi Test Facility laboratory in Bay St. Louis.
